add-a-song: Add a song from our songbook to the meeting media list.
add-a-video-explain: Add one of the videos from the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses to the media list. The latest videos are displayed here, but you can also search through all videos if needed.
add-media-audio-bible: Add audio recordings from the New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures
add-media-audio-bible-explain: Select a specific Bible book and chapter to download audio recordings of its verses.
add-media-study-bible: Add media from the Study Bible
add-media-study-bible-explain: Select a specific Bible book and chapter to view a list of study materials like images, videos, maps and historical references.
advancedDescription: Advanced users can adjust these settings. The default setup works for most people.
all-clips-with-this-icon-will-play: All clips with this icon will be played consecutively
also-look-for-this-button-in-m-s-footer: Also, look for this button in M³'s footer:
app-description: Meeting Media Manager is a cross-platform app for displaying media at congregation meetings of Jehovah's Witnesses.
app-issues: If you're facing any issues or have found a bug, please create an issue or a discussion on our GitHub repository page.
applicationConfigurationDescription: Customize this app's behavior and appearance
archive-file-found: Archive files must be processed separately.
are-you-sure-delete: Are you sure you want to delete the file "{mediaToDelete}"?
are-you-sure-delete-all: Are you sure you want to remove all manually added items for the selected day?
are-you-sure-delete-cache: Are you sure you want to delete all cached files?
are-you-sure-delete-unused-cache: Are you sure you want to delete unused files from the cache?
are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-pro: Are you sure you want to delete the {profileName} profile?
audio-bible-media: Audio recordings from the New World Translation
auto-update-app: Automatically download and install application updates
auto-update-app-explain: This option should always be enabled to receive the latest features, improvements, and bug fixes.
autoReturnFromWebsite: Automatically go to media list after stopping website mirroring
autoReturnFromWebsiteDescription: When enabled, the app will automatically navigate to the media list after you stop mirroring the website.
autoStartAtLogin: Automatically start M³ on computer startup
autoStartAtLogin-explain: M³ can start automatically when the computer is started.
autoStartMusic: Automatically start background music before meetings
autoStartMusic-explain: Background music will start playing automatically if a meeting is scheduled to start in the minutes or hours after M³ is launched.
ayfm: Apply Yourself to the Field Ministry
baseUrl-explain: Enter the address used to access the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses.
beginPlaybackPaused-explain: When enabled, audio and video will start in a paused state, allowing you to prepare other operations (like Zoom screen sharing) before beginning playback.
cacheFolder-explain: Select a folder to store cache files, such as publications and media. If left blank, the app will configure this for you automatically.
cacheFolder-wizard: Not sure? Skip this step. We'll choose a default location that works for most people.
camera-access-required: Camera is unavailable or permissions are missing
camera-access-required-explain: Please try a different camera or restart the app when camera permissions have been granted in System Settings.
change-tag-explain: Change the tag type and label for this media item.
choose-a-document-for-import: Select an article, chapter, or heading:
clicking-it-will-allow-you-to-start-and-: Clicking it will allow you to start and stop the playback of background music. Music will start playing automatically before a meeting is scheduled to start when M³ is launched, and will also stop automatically before the meeting starts. However, background music playback will need to be manually started after the closing prayer, using this button.
clicking-it-will-allow-you-to-temporaril: Clicking it will allow you to temporarily hide the media and yeartext, and reveal the Zoom participants underneath. Once the Zoom part is over, you can show the yeartext again using the same button.
clicking-the-close-button-again-will-clo: Clicking the same button again will quit M³.
clip-played: This clip has already been played
configure-a-scene-in-obs-studio-to-captu: Configure a scene in @:obsStudio to capture the media window.
configure-a-scene-in-obs-studio-to-show-: Configure a scene in @:obsStudio to show a stage wide shot.
configure-the-websocket-plugin-in-obs-st: You'll need to configure the @:obsWebSocket plugin in @:obsStudio. The Virtual Camera plugin is also required, so make sure it's installed and configured as well.
congregation-lookup-explain: Enter keywords such as your congregation's name as well as the city or area in which it is located. This information will be used to attempt to automatically retrieve the meeting schedule and language.
congregationMeetingsDescription: Settings relating to your congregation and meeting schedule
congregationName-explain: This name will be shown in the app's profile selection menu.
convertFilesToMp4-explain: When enabled, non-video files are converted to MP4 format before being exported. This ensures compatibility with Zoom's native MP4 sharing feature, offering easier and higher-quality media playback compared to screen sharing.
coWeek: Următoarea vizită planificată a supraveghetorului de circumscripție
coWeek-explain: If entered, M³ will automatically move the midweek meeting to Tuesday on that week. It will also skip media for the Congregation Bible Study, and skip the closing songs for both the midweek and weekend meetings.
currently-loading: The media for this date is currently loading.
custom-background-removed: The custom background has now been removed.
custom-background-set: The chosen image is now displayed instead of the yeartext.
custom-background-will-not-persist: Please note that the custom background will not be saved if you quit the app.
customEventLastSongShortcut-explain: Keyboard shortcut sent when the final song in a meeting finishes playing.
customEventMediaPauseShortcut-explain: Keyboard shortcut sent when media is paused.
customEventMediaPlayShortcut-explain: Keyboard shortcut sent when media starts playing.
customEventMediaStopShortcut-explain: Keyboard shortcut sent when media stops playing.
darkMode-explain: Force the app to use light or dark mode, or use the system default
delete-media-explain: Choose this option to delete the selected media item.
delete-selected-media-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected media item(s)? This action cannot be undone.
delete-selected-media-explain: This will permanently delete the selected media items from your computer if they were added manually. This will not delete any media that was downloaded automatically.
disableHardwareAcceleration-explain: This disables hardware acceleration in M³. Toggling this setting requires a restart of the app to take effect. This may resolve graphical glitches or crashes on some systems, but is not otherwise recommended.
disableMediaFetching: Disable features for regular meetings and automatic media fetching
disableMediaFetching-explain: This setting should remain disabled in almost all cases to ensure that regular meeting media is downloaded automatically. Enabling this setting will require all media to be added manually. This setting should only be enabled in profiles that will be used exclusively for special events such as theocratic schools, assemblies, or conventions.
does-your-kingdom-hall-use-a-program-cal: Does your Kingdom Hall use a program called @:obsStudio?
doing-so-will-greatly-simplify-and-facil: Doing so will greatly simplify and facilitate sharing media during hybrid meetings.
dont-forget-add-missing-media: Don't forget to add any missing songs or media.
dont-forget-to-add-circuit-overseer-date: For best results, add the date of the circuit overseer's visit to the "@:congregationMeetings" section in @:settings.
drag-and-drop-or-click-to-browse: Drag and drop files here or click to browse.
drop-media-here: Drop here to add to this section
edit-sections-explain: Add, reorder or change custom media sections
enableCacheAutoClear-explain: When enabled, the app will automatically clear unused cached files on a regular basis. This helps to free up disk space and keep the cache size manageable.
enableCustomEvents-explain: Configure keyboard shortcuts to trigger when various events occur, such as when media is played, paused or stopped, or when the last song is played during a meeting. This is useful for advanced users who want to integrate with other applications, such as AutoHotkey or AutoIt.
enableExtraCache-explain: Cache all songbook videos to improve performance. Note that this will increase the size of the media cache.
enableFolderWatcher-explain: This feature monitors a folder of your choice for new files, automatically adding them to the media list.
enableKeyboardShortcuts-explain: Use keyboard shortcuts to streamline media presentation.
enableMediaAutoExport-explain: Automatically export media to a chosen folder, organized by day.
enableMediaDisplayButton-explain: Display images and videos in a window or on an external screen. If using at a Kingdom Hall, this should in most cases be enabled.
enableMediaWindowFadeTransitions: Enable fade transition when hiding or showing the media window
enableMediaWindowFadeTransitions-explain: When enabled, the media window will smoothly fade in and out instead of appearing/disappearing instantly. This provides a more polished visual experience.
enableMusicButton-explain: Play songs before and after the meetings with only a few clicks.
enableSubtitles-explain: Enable subtitles by default for all videos.
enter-a-key-combination-now-using-your-k: Enter a key combination now using your keyboard.
enter-the-port-and-password-configured-i: Enter the port and password configured in the @:obsWebSocket plugin in @:obsStudio.
entireFile-question: Are you sure you want to play the entire file from start to finish?
excludeFootnotes: Exclude notele de subsol din Studiul Turnului de Veghe
excludeFootnotes-explain: Do not include videos or other media from footnotes in Watchtower articles.
excludeTh: Exclude all media from the Teaching brochure
excludeTh-explain: Do not include videos or other media from the Teaching brochure.
extra-media-item-explain: This media item was added manually
feel-free-to-browse-around-the-other-ava: Feel free to browse around the other available options, or if you prefer you can head right to the media playback screen and start using it to display media.
fileProcessError: There was an error processing this file
filetypeNotSupported: This file type is not yet supported
firstDayOfWeek-explain: Select which day of the week should be displayed first in a calendar week.
folderToWatch-explain: The folder that will be monitored for new media files. This folder must contain subfolders named by date (format: YYYY-MM-DD). Files in folders that don't follow this convention will be ignored.
gpu-crash-detected-explain: Hardware acceleration was temporarily disabled due to a recent crash. It will be re-enabled automatically the next time M³ is launched, unless you disable it manually in settings.
gpu-crash-detected-restarting: GPU crash detected. Switching to software mode. Please restart the app for changes to take effect.
hardwareAccelerationDisabledExplain: Hardware acceleration is currently disabled via settings.
help-translate-new: The current media language is not available as a display language in M³. Would you like to help translate M³ for users who speak this language?
here-are-some-of-the-newest-features: Here are just a few of the latest features and updates:
hide-from-list-explain: Hidden files can be restored at any time using the '@:extra-media' menu.
hide-selected-media-explain: This will hide the selected media items from the media list for the currently selected day.
hideMediaLogo: Hide JW logo from media presentation window
hideMediaLogo-explain: This removes the square JW logo from the bottom right corner. If using at a Kingdom Hall, this should in most cases be disabled.
image-duration-explain: Set how long this image will be displayed while this section is being looped
images-videos-explain: Photos, videos, audio files, PDF documents, and other media files
in-what-language-should-media-be-downloa: In what language should media be downloaded?
includePrinted: Includeți media tipărită atunci când este disponibil
includePrinted-explain: Include additional images from the printed editions of publications that may not be available in the digital versions.
integrationsDescription: Configure integration with other apps and services
jw-playlist-explain: Playlist file exported from JW Library
jw-playlist-import-explain: This feature allows you to import a JW Library playlist file. The app will automatically copy selected media files from the playlist and add them to the media list. Videos will be downloaded in the language configured in the playlist if needed.
jwpub-file-explain: Publication downloaded from the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses
jwpub-file-found: JWPUB files must be processed separately.
jwpubNoMultimedia: The JWPUB file does not contain any media
lang-explain: Choose the language in which meetings take place. This is the language that will be used to download and play media.
langFallback-explain: You can choose a secondary language here if media is often unavailable in the main language of the congregation.
langSubtitles-explain: This is the language in which subtitles will be downloaded and played.
latest-videos-from-jw-org: Latest videos from the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses
local-media-explain-1: Add photos, videos, audio files, JW Library playlists, JWPUB files, or PDF documents from your computer and they will appear in the media list.
local-media-explain-2: All common media formats are supported.
localAppLang-explain: This is the language M³ will be displayed in. It won't affect the language in which media is downloaded.
localDateFormat-explain: Customize how dates are shown in the app.
look-for-this-button-in-m-s-footer: Look for this button in M³'s footer:
m-is-now-ready-to-be-used: M³ is now ready to be used.
main-window-is-on-this-screen: The media window cannot be moved here, because the main M³ window is currently on this screen.
mainOfficialWebsite: Main official website of Jehovah's Witnesses
make-sure-that-m-is-in-not-use-before-qu: Make sure that M³ is not in use before closing it.
maxRes-explain: Choose the maximum resolution for videos. Videos above this resolution will not be downloaded.
media-item-missing-explain: This media item is missing. To play it, add it using the '@:extra-media' menu or by dragging it into the media list from your computer.
mediaRetrievalAndPlaybackDescription: Configure meeting media download and playback settings.
meetingScheduleChangeDate-explain: Enter the date when the new meeting schedule should take effect. All meetings from this date on will follow the new schedule, and the old schedule will be permanently replaced.
meetingScheduleChangeMwDay-explain: Select the new day for the midweek meeting. Leave blank if the day will not change.
meetingScheduleChangeMwStartTime-explain: Select the new start time for the midweek meeting. Leave blank if the time will not change.
meetingScheduleChangeOnce: Apply schedule change to one week only
meetingScheduleChangeOnce-explain: Enable this to apply the schedule change to only one week, starting on the specified date. This is useful for one-time changes, such as during a circuit overseer's visit to a neighboring congregation. Otherwise, the schedule will be updated for all meetings as of the specified date.
meetingScheduleChangeWeDay-explain: Select the new day for the weekend meeting. Leave blank if the day will not change.
meetingScheduleChangeWeStartTime-explain: Select the new start time for the weekend meeting. Leave blank if the time will not change.
meetingStopBufferSeconds: How many seconds before a meeting should background music stop?
meetingStopBufferSeconds-explain: Adjust the slider to set the desired time (in seconds) before a meeting starts when background music should stop.
memorialDate-explain: If entered, M³ will automatically try to download and prepare the background image for the Memorial. The image will be displayed instead of the yeartext. Beware that this is an experimental feature and may not work as expected.
meteredConnection-explain: Turn this on if you have limited internet (like mobile data). In this case, M³ won't automatically download videos and files unless they're needed for meetings on either the current day or the next one.
musicVolume-explain: Choose the volume of the background music playback. This allows you to set a lower volume for background music, while keeping the volume of other media high.
mwDay-explain: Choose the day on which the midweek meeting takes place.
mwStartTime-explain: Choose the time at which the midweek meeting starts.
next-day-with-media: Go to the first day with media
no-cache-items-found-to-clear: No cache items found to clear.
no-circuit-overseer-date-set: The date of the circuit overseer's visit is not set
no-media-files-for-section: There are no media items for this meeting section.
no-media-for-this-category: There is no media for this category
no-media-for-this-item: This item has no media available
no-media-items-found: No media items were found in this document
no-playlist-items-found: No items were found in the selected JW playlist.
no-results-explain: You'll need to enter your congregation's information manually if the lookup is unsuccessful.
no-results-short-explain: You'll need to enter more than two characters to start searching.
no-unused-cache-items-found-to-clear: No unused cache items found to clear.
noDownloadsInProgress: No downloads are currently in progress
not-yet-available-due-to-metered-connect: The media for this meeting isn't available yet because your settings prevent downloading media for dates further than 1 day in the future.
notice-the-yeartext-is-now-being-display: You'll notice the yeartext is now being displayed on the external monitor! But let's keep going.
obs-studio-disconnected-banner: M³ is unable to connect to @:obsStudio. Please ensure that @:obsStudio is running and configured correctly.
obs-studio-is-a-free-app-used-to-manage-: @:obsStudio is a free app used to manage camera and video feeds in many Kingdom Halls.
obsCameraScene-explain: The scene in @:obsStudio that will be used as the default stage view. As per latest direction, this should be a wide shot.
obsEnable-explain: Connect M³ to @:obsStudio to enable automated switching between media and camera scenes.
obsHideIcons: Do not display icons in the scene switcher
obsHideIcons-explain: When enabled, icons will be hidden in the scene switcher. This may increase the legibility of scene names.
obsImageScene-explain: A scene can be configured in @:obsStudio specifically to display images, for example in a picture-in-picture style. If this is left blank, the default media scene will be used instead.
obsMediaScene-explain: The scene in @:obsStudio that will be used to broadcast media to Zoom participants.
obsPassword-explain: Find the configured password under Tools > WebSocket Server Settings in @:obsStudio.
obsPort-explain: Find the configured port under Tools > WebSocket Server Settings in @:obsStudio.
obsPostponeImages-explain: When enabled, images will only be displayed for Zoom participants when the media operator clicks on the "Show in @:obsStudio" button. This can be useful if you generally display images to the in-person audience before sharing them on Zoom.
obsQuickToggle-explain: When enabled, hovering over the @:obsStudio button will open the scene switcher. This can be useful for quickly switching scenes in @:obsStudio, especially if many scenes are configured.
obsRememberPreviouslyUsedScene: Remember previously used scene after media playback
obsRememberPreviouslyUsedScene-explain: When enabled, M³ will remember the scene that was active before media started playing and will return to it when media playback ends. Otherwise, M³ will switch to the default camera scene.
obsSwitchSceneAfterMedia: Delay scene changes when playing media
obsSwitchSceneAfterMedia-explain: When enabled, @:obsStudio will defer scene changes until after any currently playing media has finished. Note: enabling this option will also remove media and image scenes from the scene switcher.
once-the-scene-has-been-created-select-i: Once the scene has been created, select it here.
only-show-settings-that-are-not-valid: Only show settings that are not valid
pause-to-adjust-time: To enable scrubbing, the video must be paused
play-only-this-clip-question: Are you sure you want to play this clip again?
play-while-downloading: Start streaming this media item from the internet while it's being downloaded
please-use-image-or-jwpub: Please select an image file or a JWPUB file that contains an image
profile-type-regular: In most cases, choosing "Regular" is the best option. This will create a profile that downloads media for all meetings automatically and also enables media presentation features that are most often used during congregation meetings.
profile-type-special: Choose "Other" if you are creating a profile for which no media should be automatically downloaded. Media will have to be manually added for use in this profile. This type of profile is used mostly for theocratic schools, assemblies, and other special cases.
publication-media-explain: Get media from magazines, brochures, books, and other publications
receive-beta-updates: Receive early access to beta versions
receive-beta-updates-explain: Beta updates may contain unstable features and potential bugs. Do not enable this option on the computer used for live meetings.
recordingEnable: Integrate M³ with an external recording application
recordingEnable-explain: Since M³ doesn't include a built-in recording feature, enabling this option lets it control an external recording app using keyboard shortcuts to start and stop recording. Note: this option is not compatible with @:obsStudio. If you are using OBS Studio, please use the @:obsStudio recording feature in the @:obsStudio integration instead.
recordingFolder-explain: Specify the folder where the external application saves recordings. Optional, but if provided, M³ will display a button to open this folder.
recordingStartShortcut-explain: Enter the keyboard shortcut that starts recording in the external application. M³ will send this shortcut when you press @:start-recording in the Meeting recordings popup.
recordingStopShortcut-explain: Enter the keyboard shortcut that stops recording in the external application. M³ will send this shortcut when you press @:stop-recording in the Meeting recordings popup. If left blank, M³ will reuse the @:start-recording shortcut.
refresh-all-meeting-media-confirm: This will force a refresh of all meetings and download new versions of any media that has been updated. Note that this will not affect any media that has been manually added. Are you sure you want to proceed?
rename-explain: Media items are not permanently renamed; the original name will be restored when the app is restarted.
repeat: This media item will loop continuously
repeat-media-item-explain: Choose this if the selected media item should play on a loop until it's manually stopped.
repeat-section-explain: Enable continuous playback of all media items in this section.
scene-not-found: A problem occurred while activating a scene in @:obsStudio.
scene-not-found-explain: Please check the configured scenes in @:settings.
screen-access-required: Screen recording permissions are required for this feature
screen-access-required-explain: Please restart the app when screen recording permissions have been granted in System Settings.
select-a-custom-background: Choose an image that will be displayed as the background image instead of the yeartext. This would normally be used only on special occasions, such as the Memorial.
select-a-date-to-begin: Please select a date to begin.
select-media-items-explain: Select which media items to import from this document.
select-s34mp-media: Click on a public talk title to add its media. To refresh the S-34mp file with a newer version, click Replace.
select-s34mp-to-add-pt-media: Download the S-34mp JWPUB file from the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses, then select it here to access the Public Talk Media Playlist. The file will be cached for quick access and can be updated anytime by selecting a newer file.
set-custom-durations: Set custom start and end times
setupWizard.intro: M³ makes playing media at congregation meetings easy and stress-free. Let's configure a few things, and then you'll be ready to go.
shortcutMediaNext-explain: Shortcut to select the next video or picture in the list.
shortcutMediaPauseResume-explain: Shortcut to play or pause the currently selected media. If the media is an image, pausing will have the same effect as stopping.
shortcutMediaPrevious-explain: Shortcut to select the previous video or picture in the list.
shortcutMediaStop-explain: Shortcut to stop playing the currently selected media.
shortcutMediaWindow-explain: Shortcut to quickly hide or show the media window.
shortcutMusic-explain: Shortcut to start or stop the background music.
show-hidden-media-explain: This will show any media that was previously hidden for the currently selected day.
some-media-items-are-hidden: Some media items have been hidden.
some-media-items-are-missing-explain: Some media could not be downloaded automatically. You can add this media manually if needed by using the '@:extra-media' menu or by dragging it into the media list from your computer.
some-songs-are-duplicated: Some songs appear more than once in the media list. Please check if this is intentional.
stop-playing-media-first: Please stop media playback before navigating to a different page.
stop-playing-media-first-explain: You can't change pages while media is playing.
stop-repeat-media-item: Do not loop this media item
stop-repeat-media-item-explain: Choose this if the selected media item should play until the end and then stop.
study-bible-media: Images, videos, charts and maps from the Study Bible
successfully-migrated-from-the-previous-: Successfully migrated from the previous version
suppressHardwareAccelerationReminder-exp: Disables the reminder to re-enable hardware acceleration if it was manually disabled.
sureStopVideo: Are you sure you want to stop the video?
the-name-of-your-congregation-or-group-w: The profile name will help you to quickly switch between profiles, if you ever decide to create more than one in the future.
there-are-no-media-items-for-the-selecte: There are no media items for the selected date.
this-is-a-test-version: This is a test version! Use it for testing purposes but don't keep it installed.
this-meeting-is-far-in-the-future: This meeting is in the future...
this-song-is-duplicated: This song appears more than once in the media list.
this-will-only-delete-media-for-this-day: This action will only remove items that were added manually for the selected day
this-will-speed-up-media-retrieval-for-m: This will speed up media retrieval for meeting media, but is not mandatory.
to-quickly-show-and-hide-zoom-participan: Tip: To ensure you're able to quickly show and hide Zoom participants on the TV screens when needed, make sure that the setting to "use dual monitors" in Zoom is enabled.
tryConfiguringFallbackLanguage: Try configuring a fallback language in @:settings
update-available-please-update: A new version of M³ is available! We recommend updating to receive the latest features, bug fixes, and security updates.
update-downloaded: A new version of M³ has been downloaded and is ready to be installed.
update-downloading: A new version of M³ is available and downloading in the background.
use-the-import-button-to-add-media-for-t: Use the '@:extra-media' button to add media for this date, or select a different date to view the corresponding media for that day.
use-the-slider-below-to-adjust-the-start: Use the slider below to adjust the start and end time of this media item. This is useful for playing only certain parts of a video.
watched-media-item-explain: This media item was added from a monitored folder
weDay-explain: Choose the day on which the weekend meeting takes place.
well-start-fetching-media-while-we-wrap-: We'll start fetching media while we wrap up with our initial setup.
weStartTime-explain: Choose the time at which the weekend meeting starts.
what-are-your-meeting-days-and-times-wel: What are your meeting days and times? We'll use this information to display the media calendar.
what-kind-of-profile-is-this: Choose the type of profile you would like to create.
what-language-would-you-like-m-to-be-dis: What language would you like M³ to be displayed in?
when-you-are-done-presenting-the-website: When you no longer need to present the website, either close the website window, or click on the "Stop Mirroring" button in the top right corner of this window.
when-you-click-the-button-on-the-top-rig: When you click the "Open Website" button on the top right corner of this window, a new window will open to the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses.
would-you-like-to-enable-songbook-video-: Would you like to cache all songbook videos?
would-you-like-to-integrate-m-with-obs-s: Would you like to integrate M³ with @:obsStudio?
would-you-like-to-integrate-zoom: Would you like to integrate M³ with Zoom?
yeartext-cleared: The yeartext for {currentYear} has now been restored.
yeartext-preview-failed: Failed to fetch the yeartext for {year}. Please try again later.
yeartext-preview-next-year: Would you like to preview the yeartext for {year}?
yeartext-preview-success: The yeartext for {year} will now be shown for 10 seconds.
you-can-navigate-the-website-before-pres: If necessary, you can navigate to a specific page before presenting it to the audience. When you're ready, press the "Start Mirroring" button on the top right corner of this window. What you see in the website window will now be displayed in the media window for the audience to see.
zoom-integration-explain: Enable this to let M³ automatically start and stop Zoom screen sharing when media starts and stops playing.
zoomAutoFocusMediaWindow: Automatically focus media window after Zoom screen sharing starts
zoomAutoFocusMediaWindow-explain: This is usually not required, but could be helpful on some systems if the media window regularly loses focus after Zoom screen sharing starts.
zoomEnable: Integrate M³ with Zoom screen sharing
zoomEnable-explain: Automatically start and stop Zoom screen sharing when media starts and stops playing.
zoomScreenShareShortcut-explain: Enter the keyboard shortcut configured in Zoom's "Start/stop screen sharing" setting. M³ will send this shortcut when media starts playing (to start screen sharing) and when it stops (to stop screen sharing). In order to use this feature, you need to enable the "Global shortcut" setting for that particular shortcut in Zoom's settings.
